bludgeoning.name: bludgeoning
bludgeoning.description: Blunt, crushing damage. Weak against armour, but tends toward higher damage overall.

piercing.name: piercing
piercing.description: Damage focused on a single narrow point. Highly effective against armour, but tends towards lower damage

burning.name: burning
burning.description: Damage caused by a source of extreme heat like fire or lava. Tends to be highly-damaging, but inefficient.

freezing.name: freezing
freezing.description: Cold damage, Bypasses most armour and highly efficient, but tends towards lower damage.

shocking.name: shocking
shocking.description: Electrical damage. Tends towards low damage per hit, but with multiple attacks per source.

arcane.name: arcane
arcane.description: Generalized magic energy damage. Efficient and reliable

holy.name: holy
holy.description: Righteous damage used mostly by divine spellcasters. Efficient and effective, but tends to come from restrictive sources

dark.name: dark
dark.description: Unholy, perverse damage. Excellently efficient, but tends to come with other costs.

nimble.name: Nimble
nimble.description: Soldiers with high Dexterity may gain an attack bonus with this weapon.

unwieldy.name: Unwieldy
unwieldy.description: Soliders equipping this weapon suffer an initiative penalty.

very_unwieldy.name: Unwieldy
very_unwieldy.description: Soliders equipping this weapon suffer a large initiative penalty.

slow_reload.name: Slow Reload
slow_reload.description: Soldiers must take a 'reload' standard action between attacks with this weapon.

sword.name: Sword
sword.description: A long blade attached to a handle. Deals slashing damage.

war_axe.name: War axe
war_axe.description: A heavy blade attached to a handle. Deals slashing damage.

mace.name: Mace
mace.description: A heavy, blunt instrument attached to a handle. Deals bludgeoning damage.

bow.name: Bow
bow.description: A curved piece of flexible material with a string joining the ends, for projecting a missile long distances. Deals piercing damage.

crossbow.name: Crossbow
crossbow.description: A small bow attached to a stock with a firing mechanism. Deals piercing damage.

greatsword.name: Greatsword
greatsword.description: A massive version of a Sword. Used with both hands. Deals slashing damage.

battleaxe.name: Battle Axe
battleaxe.description: A massive version of an Axe. Used with both hands. Deals slashing damage.

warhammer.name: War Hammer
warhammer.description: A massive version of a mace. Used with both hands. Deals bludgeoning damage.
